response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations or personal needs. Given its value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 14500}
